text: William Parra Sinisterra (1 March 1995) is a footballer from Colombia who plays as a defender for Moldovan club FC Sheriff Tiraspol on loan from Independiente Medellín. ==Career== ===Club=== On 17 June 2019, Parra joined HJK on loan until the end of the 2019 season, with the option of an additional year and making the transfer permanent.
